insert into sdd_type (`type`, type_desc, valid_status, flag, version, insert_time_for_his, operate_time_for_his) values (#{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{validStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{insertTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{operateTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update sdd_type set `type` = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_desc = #{typeDesc,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, valid_status = #{validStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, version = #{version,jdbcType=INTEGER}, insert_time_for_his = #{insertTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, operate_time_for_his = #{operateTimeForHis,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id, `type`, type_desc, valid_status, flag, version, insert_time_for_his, operate_time_for_his from sdd_type
